title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
You have a CSV file with population data of the USA from the year 1950 to 2000. You can access the CSV file from the link here. Header fields are year and population.https://go.qubitscs.com/JNrJ
Write a Python program to:
● store the population data in a dictionary with Year as the key and Population as the corresponding value;
● prompt the user to enter the Year to display the Population until the user opts to quit.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
